name: most-gestures
description: unified desktop/mobile high level pointer gestures, using most.js

scripts.release-patch: git checkout master; npm run build && npm version patch && npm run build; git commit -a -m 'chore(dist): built dist/'; git push origin master --tags
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master; npm run build && npm version minor && npm run build; git commit -a -m 'chore(dist): built dist/'; git push origin master --tags
scripts.release-major: git checkout master; npm run build && npm version major && npm run build; git commit -a -m 'chore(dist): built dist/'; git push origin master --tags

author: Mark 'kaosat-dev' Moissette
